info.pavie.opennetworkmap.model.network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.pavie.opennetworkmap.model.network.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    A network is a standard representation of a real network. It could be used to store public transport network, or electricity network. The nodes are Vertex objects, and edges are Edge objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Network()
      Creates an empty network.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEdge(Edge e)
      Adds an edge to the network.
      java.util.Set<Edge> getEdges() 
      java.util.Set<Vertex> getVertices() 
      void removeEdge(Edge e)
      Removes one edge, and edits attached vertices.
      void simplifyEdge(Edge e)
      Removes the given edge, and merges start and end vertices (only start is kept).
